SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT exception join :1/CMON ON CMON_ADMNO= CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO= CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS=0
where CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT<>2 and CLNT301_DUNNING='Y' :2 :3 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: if p.one_rapport_for_all_clients? is true then calling "raport per client/all"
only ones for all client
if parameters for client are field, and client do not fit in range - force print
if "p.one_rapport_for_all_clients? is "False then calling "raport per client/al"
for every client in the view

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT debb_debc_no FROM :1/debb JOIN :1/clnt ON debb_admno = clnt101_admno AND debb_clntno= clnt102_clntno JOIN :1/admn ON debb_admno = admn_no JOIN :1/debc ON debc_no = debb_debc_no JOIN :1/cmon ON cmon_admno=debb_admno AND cmon_clntno=debb_clntno AND cmon_year = :3 AND cmon_month = :4 AND cmon_currency = admn_currency WHERE clnt212_confidential = 'N' AND debb_actinvah<>0 AND clnt906_statuscontract<>2 AND clnt301_dunning='Y' AND cmon_currbaldebtors<>0 :2 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans (' L I S T I S E M P T Y ')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT cast(concat(trim(debc_admno),trim(debc_clntno)) as char(9)), debc_admno, debc_clntno, clnt110_name1,clnt110_name2, debc_no, debc_debc, CASE WHEN debc_name='' THEN concat(debh_hadr_name1,debh_hadr_name2) ELSE debc_name END AS Name, CASE WHEN debc_address='' THEN CASE WHEN debh_padr_address='' THEN debh_hadr_address ELSE debh_padr_address END ELSE debc_address END AS Address, CASE WHEN debc_address='' THEN CASE WHEN debh_padr_city='' THEN debh_hadr_city ELSE debh_padr_city END ELSE debc_city END AS City, debh_tel, debb_actinvah FROM :1/tdiv join :1/debc on debc_no=tdiv_debc_no join :1/debb on debb_debc_no=tdiv_debc_no join :1/debh on debh_no = debc_debh join :1/clnt on debc_admno = clnt101_admno and debc_clntno= clnt102_clntno where tdiv_callprog =':2' and tdiv_invo_no=0
ORDER BY debc_admno, debc_clntno, debc_debc_sort for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
